page.title: 07KANGOL LTD, CLEATOR
page.content: The biggest employer in Cleator Moor is Kangol Limited.It is situated by the River Ehen on the main road from Cockermouth to Egremont.It employs about 300 local people mainly women.It has been producing hats and caps on this site for about 50 years.The people employed work 35 hours a week and finish at 1.pm on a Friday.Most of the merchandise is made for an export market.Hats and caps mainly for the armed services are exported to many Countries including U.S.A.,Australia, New Zealand,Japan,South America, France,Germany and Norway.In the factory there are about 300 machines in use.Apart from making military hats, Kangol is famous for its golf caps and Deer Stalkers.Many local men can be seen wearing caps and hats made in their own Town. by Andrea Tynan (11)
